type.description: The type of block to be push.

ruleName.description: The name of the connection block rule.

commandLine.description: The command line to be blocked.

protocol.description: The protocol to be blocked (e.g., TCP, UDP).

direction.description: The direction of the connection to be blocked (e.g., inbound, outbound).

ipVersion.description: The IP version to be blocked (e.g., IPV4, IPV6).

localAddress.description: The local address to be blocked.

any.description: If set to true, all local connections are blocked, regardless of IP address.

ipMask.description: If any set to false, only connections to or from the local addresses specified under this setting are blocked.

portRange.description: If a range is used, only local connections made through ports between these two values are blocked.

remoteAddress.description: The remote address to be blocked.

any.description: If set to true, all remote connections are blocked, regardless of IP address.

ipMask.description: If any set to false, only connections to or from the remote addresses specified under this setting are blocked.

portRange.description: If a range is used, only remote connections made through ports between these two values are blocked.

directlyConnected.description: If enabled, the rule applies only to connections to or from specific Mac addresses.

enable.description: If enabled, the rule applies only to connections to or from specific Mac addresses. For Directly connected

remoteMac.description: Only connections from the specified Mac addresses are allowed. For Directly connected

description: Push connection blocks from BitDefender GravityZone
name: Block connections

result.description: This method returns a Boolean which is True if the operation was successful.
